cogs.name: General
cogs.short_help: Commands that don't really fit into the other categories
cogs.help:
Commands that don't really fit into the other categories

Random and/or fun commands with a variety of uses

cogs.name: Audio
cogs.short_help: For playing audio in a voice channel
cogs.help:
For playing audio in a voice channel

The mangobyte audio system uses things called 'clips'. For more info on these, check out `/docs Clips`

cogs.name: Dotabase
cogs.short_help: For information about the game Dota 2 [Patch **7.31c**]
cogs.help:
For information about the game Dota 2 [Patch **7.31c**]

Interfaces with [dotabase](http://github.com/mdiller/dotabase). Check out [dotabase.dillerm.io](http://dotabase.dillerm.io) if you want to see an old website I built that interfaces with dotabase.

cogs.name: DotaStats
cogs.short_help: Commands for displaying information about Dota 2 players and matches
cogs.help:
Commands for displaying information about Dota 2 players and matches

Most of the data for this is collected through the [OpenDota API](https://docs.opendota.com/)

cogs.name: Pokemon
cogs.help:
Pokemon related commands

A few commands using the [pokeapi](https://pokeapi.co/) which provides information about pokemon

Note that the above API does not include information about pokemon Sun and Moon, so I can't look up those pokemon for you

cogs.name: Admin
cogs.short_help: Commands to help manage mangobyte on your server/guild
cogs.help:
Commands to help manage mangobyte on your server/guild

Primarily used to configure mangobyte for this particular server/guild, and also for moving in and out of voice channels.

Only admins or people with the correct role can use these commands. To set a role as the 'Bot Admin' role, try `/config botadmin`. Note that the `/summon` and `/unsummon` commands can be configured to be usable by everyone via `/config restrictsummoning disable`.
